Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 108 Halsted/95th buses rerouted NB: Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th; SB: 95th, State, 87th, and Halsted due to, street blockage at 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Southbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, and Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th & 112 Vincennes/111th buses rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette and 95th Red Line Terminal; WB: 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th Red Line Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
